content.raw: There is a really annoying bug which makes most names of services and topics unreadable in the html page like http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?tut=ros_comm where names like `About the gazebo_ros_paths_plugin` are being converted to `About the gazeborospaths_plugin` which italicizes the "ros" (as underscore in markdown => italic) and makes it illegible.
content.html: There is a really annoying bug which makes most names of services and topics unreadable in the html page like http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?tut=ros_comm where names like About the gazebo_ros_paths_plugin are being converted to About the gazebo<em>ros</em>paths_plugin which italicizes the "ros" (as underscore in markdown => italic) and makes it illegible.
